snippet.title: Skies of Glory Trailer
snippet.description: SGN's Skies of Glory is a new aerial combat game set in World War II, which is available for the iPhone and iPod touch.  Enthusiasts can play the ultimate speed-driven, World War II air combat game with exhilarating features, enabling lightning fast multiplayer game play over 3G, WiFi and Bluetooth connections. Following the success of SGN best-selling gaming application F.A.S.T., Skies of Glory provides stunning, immersive graphics featuring various terrains such as mountain ranges, deserts, islands and oceans, which showcase classic air combat landscapes.
